A new Paradigm of Education and Training
Background
Vision & Mission
Infrastructure
Courses
Placements
Sai Vidya Institute of Technology is an engineering college in Bengaluru, affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi, recognised by Government of Karnataka
and approved by All India Council of Technical Education, New Delhi, India.
It was established in the year 2008 by Sri Sai Vidya Vikas Shikshana Samithi (SSVVSS) which is a trust formed by a team of professors under the leadership of Prof M.R.Holla,
a recipient of Karnataka Rajyothsava Award in recognition of his unparalleled services to technical education as Principal of RVCE (20 Years).
The team consists of Prof. Y. Jayasimha, Prof. R.C. Shanmukha Swamy, Prof.A.M.Padma Reddy, Sri. Srinivas Raju, Sri Manohar.M.K and Sri. Narayan Raju.
MOTTO
"Learn to lead...."
VISION
"Contribute dedicated, skilled, intelligent engineers and business administrators to architect strong India and the world."
MISSION
	To provide quality education and skilled training to produce dedicated engineers and managers.
	To promote research, innovation and ethical practices by creating supportive environment.
	To undertake collaborative projects with academia and industry that transform young minds into socially responsible citizen and globally competent professionals.
	To enhance personality traits which leads to entrepreneurship qualities among the students.
The campus has a total built-up area of 28700 sq.m consisting of three interconnected blocks with separate entrances for each.
Each block houses class room wings, laboratory wings, department wings, staff rooms, washrooms and common room.
Each floor houses a department with a separate cabin for HOD and corporate style staff cabins with basic computer, internet and communication infrastructure.
Separate washrooms for staff, girls and boys and separate common rooms for boys and girls have been provided in all the floors.
39 spacious and well ventilated class rooms of 100 sq.m each and 11 tutorial rooms with an area of 50 sq.m each provided with comfortable desks (2 Seater) and
basic requirements to accommodate more than sixty students.
The Laboratory wing one on each floor contains about ...

Engineering Programs Offered
Computer Science & Engineering (CSE)
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (AI & ML)
Artificial Intelligence & Data Science (AI & DS)
Computer Science Eng. -Cyber Security (CSE-CybSec)
Information Science & Engineering(ISE)
Electronics & Communication Engineering
Mechanical Engineering
Master Of Buisness Administration
Vision & MissionQuality PolicyAim & Objective
VisionThe future is embodied in the present generation. Professional education combined with practical exposure to create values in the students who are the future of our nation.
MissionWork oriented education combined with ethical values, character building in context of today`s millennium.
The Sambhram Institute of Technology is committed to create quality professionals to meet the emerging industrial and social needs through innovative teaching applied research, Industrial Interaction, Placing faith in human values and aiming at continual improvement in all activities. We strive to provide the quality education that meets the need and aspirations of the students, employers and society. The institute aims to respond to all of these groups by providing curriculum and support which is necessary to enable the progression and to allow individuals to grow, develop and become universally accepted technocrat.
SaIT aims at an integral training of students forming them into genuine persons with relevant skills, values and attributes in such a way that they are enabled to develop a career sensitive to the challenging world of technological advancement and to live for the prosperity of every human being. We cultivate the basic qualities among students to build up a strong character and imbibe a sense of moral, ethical and spiritual values. Towards this end, we are imparting an integral training to transform students to genuine citizens for the prosperity of every man and woman in our country.
Message from Chairman
We are very pleased to have you join us. You bring great talent and energy to Sambhram Groups, students, colleagues, alumni and the larger community we serve. The Sambhram Group recognizes that its greatest assets are its employees. Through a variety of human resources programs, Sambhram invests in its people. The payoff to that investment is through employees who are intellectually and professionally endowed and rewarded, and who make personal and professional contributions for the benefit of everyone served by the Institutions.
Dr.Nagaraj VChairman, Sambhram Group
Dr.Venkatesh RFounder, Sambhram Group(1947-2018)

Computer Science & Engineering (CSE)
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (AI & ML)
Artificial Intelligence & Data Science (AI & DS)
Computer Science Eng. -Cyber Security (CSE-CybSec)
Information Science & Engineering(ISE)
Electronics & Communication Engineering
Mechanical Engineering
Master Of Buisness Administration
Vision & MissionQuality PolicyAim & Objective
VisionThe future is embodied in the present generation. Professional education combined with practical exposure to create values in the students who are the future of our nation.
MissionWork oriented education combined with ethical values, character building in context of today`s millennium.
The Sambhram Institute of Technology is committed to create quality professionals to meet the emerging industrial and social needs through innovative teaching applied research, Industrial Interaction, Placing faith in human values and aiming at continual improvement in all activities. We strive to provide the quality education that meets the need and aspirations of the students, employers and society. The institute aims to respond to all of these groups by providing curriculum and support which is necessary to enable the progression and to allow individuals to grow, develop and become universally accepted technocrat.
SaIT aims at an integral training of students forming them into genuine persons with relevant skills, values and attributes in such a way that they are enabled to develop a career sensitive to the challenging world of technological advancement and to live for the prosperity of every human being. We cultivate the basic qualities among students to build up a strong character and imbibe a sense of moral, ethical and spiritual values. Towards this end, we are imparting an integral training to transform students to genuine citizens for the prosperity of every man and woman in our country.
Message from Chairman
We are very pleased to have you join us. You bring great talent and energy to Sambhram Groups, students, colleagues, alumni and the larger community we serve. The Sambhram Group recognizes that its greatest assets are its employees. Through a variety of human resources programs, Sambhram invests in its people. The payoff to that investment is through employees who are intellectually and professionally endowed and rewarded, and who make personal and professional contributions for the benefit of everyone served by the Institutions.
Dr.Nagaraj VChairman, Sambhram Group
Dr.Venkatesh RFounder, Sambhram Group(1947-2018)

About SDMCET, DharwadShri Dharmasthala Manjunatheshwara College of Engineering & Technology, Dharwad was established in the year 1979 under the flagship of SDME Society and has grown into one of the nationally acclaimed premier engineering institutions in the country. The Institution has been consistently rated high, ranking within 50, among the top private engineering colleges in the country.
Explore More
President’s Message
I am delighted to know that Shri Dharmasthala Manjunatheshwara College of Engineering and Technology, Dharwad, is entering its forty fourth year.
I appreciate the services and efforts by the Principal, Faculty and Staff making the Institution being consistently ranked high among Engineering Colleges in India and in Karnataka. Ultimately, all these credentials will reflect on the students education and their future prospects. Teachers participation should be continued in the same spirit of achieving the common goal of meaningful education to students with clarity, dignity and integrity
I also hope that SDMCET will further grow in academics and the students studying in this Institution will bring laurels by their extraordinary talent. May Lord Manjunatha Swamy shower his choicest Blessings on you all.– DR. D. VEERENDRA HEGGADE
Principal’s Message Dear Students, Faculty Members, and Staff, It is with great pride and honor that I welcome you to our prestigious engineering college. At our institution, we are committed to providing quality education, and we will leave no stone unturned in ensuring that you receive an education that is of the highest quality. Our faculty members are experts in their respective fields and pay personal attention to all the students . Moreover, our state-of-the-art facilities and resources com...

About SDMCET, DharwadShri Dharmasthala Manjunatheshwara College of Engineering & Technology, Dharwad was established in the year 1979 under the flagship of SDME Society and has grown into one of the nationally acclaimed premier engineering institutions in the country. The Institution has been consistently rated high, ranking within 50, among the top private engineering colleges in the country.
Explore More
President’s Message
I am delighted to know that Shri Dharmasthala Manjunatheshwara College of Engineering and Technology, Dharwad, is entering its forty fourth year.
I appreciate the services and efforts by the Principal, Faculty and Staff making the Institution being consistently ranked high among Engineering Colleges in India and in Karnataka. Ultimately, all these credentials will reflect on the students education and their future prospects. Teachers participation should be continued in the same spirit of achieving the common goal of meaningful education to students with clarity, dignity and integrity
I also hope that SDMCET will further grow in academics and the students studying in this Institution will bring laurels by their extraordinary talent. May Lord Manjunatha Swamy shower his choicest Blessings on you all.– DR. D. VEERENDRA HEGGADE
Principal’s Message Dear Students, Faculty Members, and Staff, It is with great pride and honor that I welcome you to our prestigious engineering college. At our institution, we are committed to providing quality education, and we will leave no stone unturned in ensuring that you receive an education that is of the highest quality. Our faculty members are experts in their respective fields and pay personal attention to all the students . Moreover, our state-of-the-art facilities and resources com...

How to Manage Your Bankroll: Essential Tips for Sports Bettors
Successful sports betting is not just about picking winners — it’s also about managing your bankroll effectively. Whether you’re a seasoned bettor or just starting out, proper bankroll management is the key to staying in the game and maximizing your profits over the long run. Without a solid strategy for managing your funds, even the most skilled handicappers can find themselves on the losing end, chasing losses and making impulsive bets that only compound their problems.
In this article, we’ll explore the essential tips and strategies for managing your bankroll like a pro. From setting realistic bankroll limits to implementing disciplined staking plans, we’ll cover the fundamental principles that separate the winners from the losers in the world of sports betting. By mastering these techniques, you’ll not only protect your hard-earned money but also position yourself for long-term success, minimizing the emotional rollercoaster that often accompanies this exhilarating pursuit. Get ready to take control of your bankroll and elevate your sports betting game to new heights.

Secab Association
News
Hon'ble Rajyasabha MP Dr. Sayed Naseer Hussain had an academic session with teaching staff of
SECAB Association. He addressed about the cultural, religious hormony and education.
The programme was conducted at SECAB's ARSI Inamdar Degree College Vijayapur, on 08-07-2021
following Covid Protocol.
PLACEMENT
CONTACT US
News
Academic colloquium on "Faculty Development Program" , Three day National Level Students Event
"Technozian-2017"
About Secab
Association
SECAB - Socio Economic Cultural Association Bijapur was established in the year 1969 by Shamsuddin
Punekar to provide education to the children of Vijayapur. Now, it is one of the largest and leading
educational groups of institutions in the state of Karnataka accepted as a standard educational
institution in India. Presently, Secab under its umbrella has 26 educational institutions, more than
10,000 students and around 1000 employees. It has two campuses: Naubag sprawling over 11 acres in
the heart of the city and Nauraspur sprawling over 16.5 acres on Bagalkot Road South of the city.
S.A Punekar (
Founder & President )
President's Message
"We at SECAB provide you the idea to live on
and the wings to fly with this idea, which will take you all the way to success. At SECAB, every new
session draws more and more aspirants on account of its quality of professional education imparted
in a highly disciplined academic environment with a scope of all round development of personality."
The vision of the management, environment of the institute and endeavors of the faculty members have
raised this prestigious institute to greater heights, setting SECAB at the place of pride among all
colleges in Vijayapur. We give the students all the support and encouragement they need to reach
their full potential. In today’s era of liberalization, privatization and globalization, we try to
groom, nourish and nurture our students in such a way that they are fully equipped to meet the
global demands.

educational groups of institutions in the state of Karnataka accepted as a standard educational
institution in India. Presently, Secab under its umbrella has 26 educational institutions, more than
10,000 students and around 1000 employees. It has two campuses: Naubag sprawling over 11 acres in
the heart of the city and Nauraspur sprawling over 16.5 acres on Bagalkot Road South of the city.
S.A Punekar (
Founder & President )
President's Message
"We at SECAB provide you the idea to live on
and the wings to fly with this idea, which will take you all the way to success. At SECAB, every new
session draws more and more aspirants on account of its quality of professional education imparted
in a highly disciplined academic environment with a scope of all round development of personality."
The vision of the management, environment of the institute and endeavors of the faculty members have
raised this prestigious institute to greater heights, setting SECAB at the place of pride among all
colleges in Vijayapur. We give the students all the support and encouragement they need to reach
their full potential. In today’s era of liberalization, privatization and globalization, we try to
groom, nourish and nurture our students in such a way that they are fully equipped to meet the
global demands.

placement.content:
Sri Sairam College of Engineering Bangalore|Admissions B.E(CSE,ECE,EEE,MECH, AI & ML) & Ph.D(MECH)
Our
Accreditation & Recognition
Our
Placement
Partners
About Us
Sri Sairam College of Engineering formerly Shirdi Sai Engineering College, Bengaluru, established in the year 1997 by MJF.Ln .Leomuthu, Founder Chairman of Sapthagiri Educational and Charitable Trust, is a non-profitable and non-minority institution. Located within the Bengaluru city limits, Sairam College is an inspirational place to study in which everything from classroom to laboratories, hostel to cafeteria are modernised with state-of-the art infrastructure. The labs and other facilities are among the best in the region making it one of the most sought after institutions by parents and students.
The Ultra-modern computer labs with latest software and hardware, and techno-visionary innovative centre make the institution learning heaven for enthusiastic young engineering aspirants. ICT enabled class rooms and work areas are well furnished and equipped with modern up-to-date facilities.
Read More
Programs
B.E Computer Science and Engineering
B.E Electronics & Communication Engineering
B.E Electrical & Electronics Engineering
B.E Mechanical Engineering
B.E Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Engineering
B.E Information Science and Engineering
B.E CSE -Internet of Things & Cyber Security Program
Ph.D
Students Corner
Our College provides a very enriching and rewarding experience to all students. Curriculum and pedagogy have been designed in a way to make the teaching learning process both interesting and challenging. Project based learning make students really interested in doing innovative projects and attending various competitions. In addition, activities like Induction Programme, Farewell programme, Mentor-Mentee system and strong bonding between the students and faculty make the students always eager and motivated to learn.
Read More

placement.content:
Shridevi Institute of Engineering and Technology
Skip to content
Landing Pages 2026 1 (1)Landing Pages 2026 (1)
Placements
We equip students with relevant professional skills and guide them toward a bright future. Our aim is to foster innovation and a passion for learning, empowering them to excel in their chosen fields.
Admissions
SIET, Tumakuru, is approved by AICTE, New Delhi, and DTE, Bengaluru, and holds a prestigious 'A' grade accreditation. All engineering degree programs at SIET are affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU).
Facilities
Experienced and highly qualified faculty deliver top-quality education, mentorship, and support, providing expert guidance throughout each student's academic journey.
SHRIDEVI INSTITUTE OF ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY
Founder's Vision and Legacy
Honorable Dr. M. R. Hulinaykar, the founder and chairman of Sri Shridevi Charitable Trust (R.), envisioned SIET as a hub for quality technical education in Tumakuru. His dedication to education and his native district led to the establishment of SIET in 2002. Dr. Hulinaykar's leadership has been instrumental in the growth of the institute, which now offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate and research programs, and has produced graduates who excel in their respective fields both in India and abroad.
Overview of Shridevi Institute of Engineering and Technology (SIET)
Shridevi Institute of Engineering and Technology (SIET), situated in Tumakuru, Karnataka, is a prominent educational institution affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi, Karnataka, and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. Founded by Honorable Dr. M. R. Hulinaykar, SIET is dedicated to delivering quality technical education and has significantly contributed to the educational landscape of the region.
Academic Programs and Achievements
Established in 2002, SIET offers a comprehensive range of academic programs, including 9 undergraduate, 5 postgraduate, and 5 Ph.D. research programs in the fields of Engineering, Technology, and Management. With an annual intake of 630 undergraduate and 207 postgraduate students, the institute has successfully graduated 18 batches of engineering students, many of whom have pursued higher studies and secured successful careers globally.
Sri Shridevi Charitable Trust and Visionary Leadership
SIET operates under the aegis of the Sri Shridevi Charitable Trust (R.), Tumakuru, founded in 1992 by Dr. M. R. Hulinaykar, a renowned surgeon, academician, and educationalist. The Trust manages over 12 institutions across various educational streams, embodying Dr. Hulinaykar's vision of promoting quality education from pre-primary to postgraduate levels. The establishment of SIET is a testament to his commitment to education and his dedication to the development of his native district.

infrastructure.content:
Shridevi Institute of Engineering and Technology
Skip to content
Landing Pages 2026 1 (1)Landing Pages 2026 (1)
Placements
We equip students with relevant professional skills and guide them toward a bright future. Our aim is to foster innovation and a passion for learning, empowering them to excel in their chosen fields.
Admissions
SIET, Tumakuru, is approved by AICTE, New Delhi, and DTE, Bengaluru, and holds a prestigious 'A' grade accreditation. All engineering degree programs at SIET are affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU).
Facilities
Experienced and highly qualified faculty deliver top-quality education, mentorship, and support, providing expert guidance throughout each student's academic journey.
SHRIDEVI INSTITUTE OF ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY
Founder's Vision and Legacy
Honorable Dr. M. R. Hulinaykar, the founder and chairman of Sri Shridevi Charitable Trust (R.), envisioned SIET as a hub for quality technical education in Tumakuru. His dedication to education and his native district led to the establishment of SIET in 2002. Dr. Hulinaykar's leadership has been instrumental in the growth of the institute, which now offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate and research programs, and has produced graduates who excel in their respective fields both in India and abroad.
Overview of Shridevi Institute of Engineering and Technology (SIET)
Shridevi Institute of Engineering and Technology (SIET), situated in Tumakuru, Karnataka, is a prominent educational institution affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi, Karnataka, and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. Founded by Honorable Dr. M. R. Hulinaykar, SIET is dedicated to delivering quality technical education and has significantly contributed to the educational landscape of the region.
Academic Programs and Achievements
Established in 2002, SIET offers a comprehensive range of academic programs, including 9 undergraduate, 5 postgraduate, and 5 Ph.D. research programs in the fields of Engineering, Technology, and Management. With an annual intake of 630 undergraduate and 207 postgraduate students, the institute has successfully graduated 18 batches of engineering students, many of whom have pursued higher studies and secured successful careers globally.
Sri Shridevi Charitable Trust and Visionary Leadership
SIET operates under the aegis of the Sri Shridevi Charitable Trust (R.), Tumakuru, founded in 1992 by Dr. M. R. Hulinaykar, a renowned surgeon, academician, and educationalist. The Trust manages over 12 institutions across various educational streams, embodying Dr. Hulinaykar's vision of promoting quality education from pre-primary to postgraduate levels. The establishment of SIET is a testament to his commitment to education and his dedication to the development of his native district.

Sir M. Visvesvaraya Institute Of Technology
Sir M. Visvesvaraya Institute of Technology (Sir MVIT) is a Higher Education Institution in the state of Karnataka, founded by the Sri Krishnadevaraya Educational Trust in 1986. The Institute offers thirteen B.E. degree programs in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Biotechnology, Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering(Data Science), CSE (IoT & Cybersecurity including Blockchain Technology), Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics and Computer Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering, Information Science & Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Robotics & Artificial Intelligence.
Additionally, the Institute offers six Master’s programs: M.Tech. in Computer Integrated Manufacturing, Electronics, Biotechnology & Biochemical Engineering, Construction Technology, Master of Business Administration and Master of Computer Applications.
The Institute is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University and approved by All India Council for Technical Education, New Delhi and six of the programs are accredited by National Board of Accreditation, New Delhi. Sir MVIT is also accredited by National Assessment Accreditation Council with ‘A’ grade. All the departments at the Institute have been recognized as R&D centers by the affiliating university.
Read More

to 27/11/25
in MCA Lab 106 for MCA final year students.

Sir MVIT in association with Institution’s Innovation Council (IIC) 8.0 is organising “ StarPitch 3.0”, our flagship inter-college innovation and pitching event on 26th November 2025.
Institution’s Innovation Council (IIC 8.0) of Sir MVIT is organizing “ Innovation Day 2025 ” on 24th November 2025 (Monday) to commemorate the birth anniversary of Bharat Ratna Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, Former President of India
put this inder important information
The department of ECE is opening a Nodal Center – Indian Space Research Organization – Indian Institute of Remote Sensing (ISRO–IIRS) on Tuesday, 25th November 2025. The programme will be followed by an expert talk by Dr. Nemani Lakshmi Narayana, Former Senior Scientist, ISRO.
The department of MCA is organising 1-Week Workshop on “Data Visualisation for Businesses Insights:Mastering Tableau and Power BI” from 21st to 27th November 2025

Welcome to S.J.M Institute of Technology
Sri Jagadguru Murugarajendra Institute of Technology (SJMIT), since its inception in the year 1980-81, over the years has become the largest provider of engineering education in central Karnataka. Today, SJMIT is also widely regarded as one of the most prestigious private academic institutions in the state with a student population of over 1500 on board and over 250 plus academic, support and administrative staff.
Did you know…? SJMIT has produced more than 4000 B.E Degree and 20 plus M.Tech degree holders since its inception in 1980-81. Working hand-in-hand with various institutions/bodies, the institute is recognized/approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi and affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belagavi, Karnataka, and our programmes are awarded by this Technical University.

'Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav'
(AKAM)
Why we are one of top Engineering colleges in Bangalore?
Sri Raghavendra Educational Institutions Society(R) is a name synonymous with quality education of International
standards, with about three decades ofexperience in Engineering, Paramedical, International - Schools, and Technical
education. Sri Raghavendra Educational Institutions Society(R) is constantly raisingthe bar with a vision of
excellence through world-class Institutions, Infrastructure, and faculty.
Sri Raghavendra Educational Institutions Society(R) ventured into technical education. It proudly launched Sri
Krishna Institute of Technology (SKIT), one of the top engineering colleges in Bangalore,
in 2001 to ensure that
education extends beyond the classroom and translates to an experience. Sri Krishna Institute of Technology (SKIT)
is one of the Top Engineering Colleges in Bangalore affiliated to
Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU),
Belagavi, Karnataka, approved by the All India Council for Technical Education
(AICTE),
New Delhi, affiliated with
NAAC,
Bangalore, Karnataka,
India.
Sri Krishna Institute of Technology (SKIT)
campus
is situated in the center of
the city and near the country's
industrial hub, which can be easily accessible by public and Institution transport system. SKIT has got a
lushgreen campus with the state of the art infrastructure, which consists of multiple department blocks equipped
with smart boards, Wi-Fi connectivity, an e-Learning facility, well-equipped laboratories, Library â there
pository of knowledge with digital Library, Auditorium and an Amphi theatre, Track and field for Sports, Girls
and Boys Hostel, Hygienic Cafeteria, Medical center, and ATM. The entire campus is under CCTV surveillance.
The staff members of SKIT are Post Graduates, and many are Doctorate. Many are involved in Research work, and
departments have funded projects by various agencies.
The students are encouraged to take up their internship and
academic projects
in various industries. They...

'Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav'
(AKAM)
Why we are one of top Engineering colleges in Bangalore?
Sri Raghavendra Educational Institutions Society(R) is a name synonymous with quality education of International
standards, with about three decades ofexperience in Engineering, Paramedical, International - Schools, and Technical
education. Sri Raghavendra Educational Institutions Society(R) is constantly raisingthe bar with a vision of
excellence through world-class Institutions, Infrastructure, and faculty.
Sri Raghavendra Educational Institutions Society(R) ventured into technical education. It proudly launched Sri
Krishna Institute of Technology (SKIT), one of the top engineering colleges in Bangalore,
in 2001 to ensure that
education extends beyond the classroom and translates to an experience. Sri Krishna Institute of Technology (SKIT)
is one of the Top Engineering Colleges in Bangalore affiliated to
Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU),
Belagavi, Karnataka, approved by the All India Council for Technical Education
(AICTE),
New Delhi, affiliated with
NAAC,
Bangalore, Karnataka,
India.
Sri Krishna Institute of Technology (SKIT)
campus
is situated in the center of
the city and near the country's
industrial hub, which can be easily accessible by public and Institution transport system. SKIT has got a
lushgreen campus with the state of the art infrastructure, which consists of multiple department blocks equipped
with smart boards, Wi-Fi connectivity, an e-Learning facility, well-equipped laboratories, Library â there
pository of knowledge with digital Library, Auditorium and an Amphi theatre, Track and field for Sports, Girls
and Boys Hostel, Hygienic Cafeteria, Medical center, and ATM. The entire campus is under CCTV surveillance.
The staff members of SKIT are Post Graduates, and many are Doctorate. Many are involved in Research work, and
departments have funded projects by various agencies.
The students are encouraged to take up their internship and
academic projects
in various industries. They...

VCET Puttur Campus
Welcomes You
Vivekananda College of Engineering & Technology is one of the reputed engineering colleges in the coastal region of Karnataka, was established in the year 2001 by Vivekananda Vidyavardhaka Sangha Puttur® with the vision of providing quality technical education to the rural parts of coastal Karnataka.
About VCET
Life @ VCET
Vivekananda College of Engineering & Technology (VCET), Puttur, has been identified as a centre for excellence in imparting engineering education to aspiring students from all over the country and is bringing out best academic performance from the students.

placement.content:
Jyothy Institute of Technology
Skip to content
Admissions Open for Academic Year 2026-27Embark on your educational journey with us and become the hero of your academic story.Apply Now
On Campus R & D Center
Centre for Incubation, Innovation, Research & Consultancy
On - Campus Incubation Centre
Atal Incubation Centre-JIT Foundation
Who we are
Empowering Knowledge, Transforming Futures
Jyothy Institute of Technology (JIT), governed by the Jyothy Charitable Trust and headquartered in Bengaluru, is a premier institute recognized for its learning and research excellence. Known among the top engineering colleges in Bengaluru, JIT is dedicated to providing top-quality education that prepares students for successful careers and fulfilling lives.Our institute is renowned for its state-of-the-art learning and research center, offering students an opportunity to engage in cutting-edge research across diverse disciplines. We proudly provide Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Research Programmes, combining academic rigor with practical insights to meet the demands of today’s dynamic world.At JIT, education goes beyond the classroom. We encourage holistic development through vibrant extracurricular activities, including student clubs, technical chapters, sports, and cultural events. Our mission is to nurture talent, creativity, and leadership in every student.Join Jyothy Institute of Technology—where knowledge meets opportunity, research drives innovation, and future leaders are shaped.
Discover more
13+ Years of History
Embark on a journey of excellence and innovation at Jyothy Institute of Technology, where dreams come to life.
Study at JIT
Welcome to a world of transformative learning at Jyothy Institute of Technology, where extraordinary minds thrive.
Our Vision
To be an Institute of Excellence in Engineering education, Innovation and Research and work towards evolving great leaders for the country’s future and meeting global needs.
Our Mission
The Institution aims at providing a vibrant, intellectually and emotionally rich teaching learning environment with the State of the Art Infrastructure and recognizing and nurturing the potential of each individual to evolve into ones own self and contribute to the welfare of all.
To The Journey Ahead
Our Core Commitments
Create a congenial environment and provide state-of-the-art infrastructure.
Impart quality education by establishing effective learning-teaching-learning processes to produce competent engineers and managers with high professional ethics and social responsibilities.
Constantly improve the effectiveness of the quality management system.
You Apply
Transform your aspirations into reality at Jyothy Institute of Technology
Admission Enquiry
We Connect
Step into a world of endless possibilities and seize your future at Jyothy Institute of Technology, where dreams take flight.
Our Programs
Unleash your potential with our cutting-edge courses at Jyothy Institute of Technology, where knowledge meets opportuni...

placement.content:
SIT
College of
Engineering, Kalaburagi – Top Engineering College, Kalaburagi, Karnataka
Skip to content
Admission Enquiry
A Unit of SGI
Shetty Institute of Technology
Kalaburagi
Know More
Events
Upcoming
Events
Explore the vibrant academic and cultural life at our college through a series of dynamic events and value-added programs.
Student Governing Council Mock Interview on 18th & 19th August 2025
Know More!
ABOUT SIT
The Shetty Institute of Technology, popularly known as SIT, was established in the year 2011 to empower budding engineers with technical and entrepreneurial knowledge and skills, and to assist them in having a holistic growth. Located just on the other side of the Ring Road, on Gulbarga Shahabad Highway (NH 150), the college nestles amidst sprawling 22 acres of greenery with a hilly backdrop. The campus breathes fresh air of nature and has vast green pastures, free from pollution and litter. The ambience is ideal for learning, research and living.
Discover More
OUR
PROGRAMMES
Computer science & engineering
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
Electronics & Communication Engineering
Electrical &
Electronics Engineering
Civil
engineering
Read More
Read More
Courses and Pedagogy
Undergraduate
Our engineering college prioritizes delivering high-quality undergraduate education, emphasizing a robust curriculum, hands-on learning experiences, and cutting-edge technologies. Our dedicated faculty ensures a nurturing environment, fostering critical thinking and problem-solving skills essential for future engineers. We take pride in preparing students to meet industry demands and contribute meaningfully to the field of engineering..
Research & Development
Embarking on a journey in research and development, our institution is committed to fostering innovation and exploration. As we initiate this endeavor, our focus is on creating a dynamic R&D environment that encourages collaboration, curiosity, and breakthrough discoveries. By investing in state-of-the-art labs, interdisciplinary projects, and partnerships with industry leaders, we aim to lay the foundation for groundbreaking research that pushes the boundaries of knowledge and positively impacts society.
XPLORE
In our college, we actively encourage students to engage in competitions that showcase their prowess in new technologies. Through participation in various tech challenges and hackathons, students have the opportunity to apply classroom knowledge, foster creativity, and collaborate on innovative solutions. This commitment to competitive exploration not only hones their skills but also instills a competitive spirit, preparing them for the dynamic landscape of emerging technologies in the professional realm.
Project Based Learning
Project-based learning at our college is designed to provide students with a hands-on and immersive educational experience.By engaging in real-world projects, students gain practical skills, problem-solving abilities, and a deeper understanding of theore...

Student Governing Council Mock Interview on 18th & 19th August 2025
Know More!
ABOUT SIT
The Shetty Institute of Technology, popularly known as SIT, was established in the year 2011 to empower budding engineers with technical and entrepreneurial knowledge and skills, and to assist them in having a holistic growth. Located just on the other side of the Ring Road, on Gulbarga Shahabad Highway (NH 150), the college nestles amidst sprawling 22 acres of greenery with a hilly backdrop. The campus breathes fresh air of nature and has vast green pastures, free from pollution and litter. The ambience is ideal for learning, research and living.
Discover More
OUR
PROGRAMMES
Computer science & engineering
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
Electronics & Communication Engineering
Electrical &
Electronics Engineering
Civil
engineering
Read More
Read More
Courses and Pedagogy
Undergraduate
Our engineering college prioritizes delivering high-quality undergraduate education, emphasizing a robust curriculum, hands-on learning experiences, and cutting-edge technologies. Our dedicated faculty ensures a nurturing environment, fostering critical thinking and problem-solving skills essential for future engineers. We take pride in preparing students to meet industry demands and contribute meaningfully to the field of engineering..
Research & Development
Embarking on a journey in research and development, our institution is committed to fostering innovation and exploration. As we initiate this endeavor, our focus is on creating a dynamic R&D environment that encourages collaboration, curiosity, and breakthrough discoveries. By investing in state-of-the-art labs, interdisciplinary projects, and partnerships with industry leaders, we aim to lay the foundation for groundbreaking research that pushes the boundaries of knowledge and positively impacts society.
XPLORE
In our college, we actively encourage students to engage in competitions that showcase their prowess in new technologies. Through participation in various tech challenges and hackathons, students have the opportunity to apply classroom knowledge, foster creativity, and collaborate on innovative solutions. This commitment to competitive exploration not only hones their skills but also instills a competitive spirit, preparing them for the dynamic landscape of emerging technologies in the professional realm.
Project Based Learning

CMR University | Top Private University in Bangalore, Karnataka | Best University in Bangalore
programmes
Apply now
To nurture creative thinkers
who will drive positive global change
Our aim is to shape all our graduates to become creative problem solvers who are socially responsible and engaged. We are creating reflective lifelong learners and competent ethical leaders.
Preparing for Success
Knowing Self & Community
Contributing to Society
Our Curriculum is a magic mix:
Academics, Creativity and Individual Expression
Programme Curriculum
credit courses
Mastery and application of knowledge and skills specific to the discipline. Techniques and practices to make learning more meaningful, engaging and more impactful
Learn more
Common Core
credit courses
All undergraduate and masters level students
familiarize themselves with relevant skills, exposure, knowledge and practices to thrive in the professional world today and in the future.
Learn more
LEAP
Learning Engagement Advanced Programme digital portfolio
Students learn to support each other and build communities, develop deeper understanding of themselves and inculcate consistent reflective practices to improve their social wellbeing into the future.
Learn more
A Growing Campus in India’s Silicon Valley
CMR University takes pride in its three campuses—HRBR Campus, OMBR Campus, and CMRIT near ITPL—each delivering a dynamic learning environment. Among them, the 60-acre Lakeside Campus, strategically located in the heart of North Bengaluru, stands out for its serene setting and exceptional connectivity. Easily accessible from Bellary Road and near the airport, it provides seamless commutation options, ensuring a convenient and enriching educational experience both inside and outside the classroom.
Explore our new interactive 360° experience!
Explore Now
The campus was purpose-built for the digital age to encourage innovation and promote creative collisions.
CMR University delivers far more than a degree
Ranked #4
CMR University School of Engineering and Technology ranked 4th amongst Top Engineering Institutes, by Times All India Engineering Institutes Ranking Survey 2022.
5 Star Rating
CMR University Bengaluru receives “5-star ratings” by Artificial Intelligence Registration and Certification, U.K.
Emerging University
CMR University Bengaluru awarded “Emerging University of the Year” by ASSOCHAM, New Delhi.
Ranked #6
6th Among Best State Private Universities & South Zone By IIRF.
Ranked #4
CMR University School of Engineering and Technology ranked 4th amongst Top Engineering Institutes, by Times All India Engineering Institutes Ranking Survey 2022.

Vision
Mission
Goal
Notifications
Events
Vision
“Creating Competent IT Professionals With Core Values For The Real World.”
Mission
Providing Students with a Sound Knowledge in IT Fundamentals.Exposing Students to Emerging Frontiers in various domains of IT enabling Continuous Learning.Promoting Excellence in Teaching, Training, Research and Consultancy.Developing Entrepreneurial acumen to venture into Innovative areas of IT.Imparting value based Professional Education with a sense of Social Responsibility.
Goal
To commit & strive continuously to impart Quality Education in Engineering and Technology by achieving Excellence in Teaching, Training & Research to serve Industry and Society.Focus is to create Entrepreneurs and TechnocratsBGSCET aims to impart quality technical education, undertake research and extension activities with emphasis on application and innovation that cater to the emerging societal needs through all-round development of students of all sections enabling them to be globally competitive and socially responsible citizens with core values.The objectives of BGSCET are to provide:Quality Education and Empower Students to excel in their career.Modern infrastructure for holistic development of the studentsGood laboratories and library.Placement cell to train, assist and assure jobs.Counselling to benefit, co-ordinate and bring harmony on the campus

Providing Students with a Sound Knowledge in IT Fundamentals.Exposing Students to Emerging Frontiers in various domains of IT enabling Continuous Learning.Promoting Excellence in Teaching, Training, Research and Consultancy.Developing Entrepreneurial acumen to venture into Innovative areas of IT.Imparting value based Professional Education with a sense of Social Responsibility.
Goal
To commit & strive continuously to impart Quality Education in Engineering and Technology by achieving Excellence in Teaching, Training & Research to serve Industry and Society.Focus is to create Entrepreneurs and TechnocratsBGSCET aims to impart quality technical education, undertake research and extension activities with emphasis on application and innovation that cater to the emerging societal needs through all-round development of students of all sections enabling them to be globally competitive and socially responsible citizens with core values.The objectives of BGSCET are to provide:Quality Education and Empower Students to excel in their career.Modern infrastructure for holistic development of the studentsGood laboratories and library.Placement cell to train, assist and assure jobs.Counselling to benefit, co-ordinate and bring harmony on the campus
Notifications

We are proud to have

Igniting Innovation to excel
With the mission of "Education par Excellence" East West Group of Institutions has become an
educational hub for thousands of students hailing from different parts of the world. The
institutions which include schools, pre-university and higher education colleges spread
over 10 Campuses offer a wide range of opportunities that not only brighten your future
career, also make you true global citizens.
Academics
Technical
Cultural
Sports
About our College
Affiliated to Visvesvaraya
Technological University (VTU), Belagavi
East West College of Engineering established in 2015 with the prime motto to
serve the best quality based technical education and
the campus is advantageously located in a well-known green city of Bengaluru and
has an extensive vicinity of 5 acres of land surrounded with congeal and
pleasant learning atmosphere.
EWCE has always stood for discipline and the molding of character of its
students. Our college prides itself in imparting best part of education by
providing a strong foundation for the holistic education. East West College of
Engineering stands testimony to the high professional standard aimed for and
achieved by the EWGI.

Aeronautical Engineering
Agriculture Engineering
Computer Science & Engineering
Electronics & Communication Engineering
Mechanical Engineering

the campus is advantageously located in a well-known green city of Bengaluru and
has an extensive vicinity of 5 acres of land surrounded with congeal and
pleasant learning atmosphere.
EWCE has always stood for discipline and the molding of character of its
students. Our college prides itself in imparting best part of education by
providing a strong foundation for the holistic education. East West College of
Engineering stands testimony to the high professional standard aimed for and
achieved by the EWGI.
B.E Courses Offered @ East West College of Engineering
Aeronautical Engineering
Agriculture Engineering
Computer Science & Engineering
Electronics & Communication Engineering
Mechanical Engineering

KNOW ABOUT US
Established with a history spanning over two and a half decades, RV College of Architecture(RVCA) stands as an esteemed institution renowned for cultivating innovative leaders and pioneers within the architectural realm. Our educational philosophy is centred around a comprehensive integration of stringent academic standards, rigorous research endeavours, and hands-on practical consulting opportunities.
Read More
WHY US?
What are the available admission routes for the Bachelor of Architecture (B.Arch.) programme at RVCA?RVCA offers admission to the B.Arch. programme through three primary routes: Karnataka Common Entrance Test (KCET), Consortium of Medical, Engineering and Dental Colleges, Undergraduate Entrance Examination (COMEDK UGEEE), and Management Quota. Each route has specific eligibility criteria and a distinct selection process.
What entrance examinations are required for admission to the B.Arch. programme?All applicants seeking admission to the B.Arch. programme must possess a valid score in either the National Aptitude Test in Architecture (NATA) or the JEE Main Paper II.
What is the fee structure ...

About BMS College of Architecture, Design and Planning
BMSCA D&P is affiliated to the Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi and recognized by the Council of Architecture, New Delhi. Conveniently located in the heart of the city, it has been a front runner in the field of architectural education for the past 40 years. The college is well equipped with state of the art facilities and infrastructure and is strong academically with well qualified faculty who are specialized in diverse fields of architecture. BMSCA D&P offers an environment ideal for stimulating discourse on art, architecture, technology and sustainability.
Read More..

For over four decades, the BMS
College of Architecture, Design and Planning (BMSCA D&P) has played a
pioneering role in architectural education across Karnataka. Built on a
distinguished legacy of academic excellence, our institution continues to
evolve at the intersection of technology, society, and the environment, shaping
the built world with integrity and a deep culture of inquiry.
Dr. Vidya Srikanth
Director, Architecture, Design and Planning (BMSCA D&P)

placement.content:
PDSS School of Architecture - HKES
COA CODE: KA06
CET CODE: E293
COMEDK CODE: E-213
Your browser does not support the video tag.
About the College
The HKE Society envisioned starting a program in architecture with aim to cater to the needs of Building and Construction Industry in Northern region of Karnataka. The Department of Architecture was established under the aegis of PDA College of Engineering in the year 1983-84 with an intake of 40 approved by the Council of Architecture and affiliated to the Gulbarga University,
The Department of Architecture has celebrated its âSILVER JUBIILEEâ in 2009 and has achieved many feats and awards.
Its alumni have spread all over the globe serving the Building Industry at various positions.
In 2015 the intake was enhanced from 40 to 80 by the Council of architecture, New Delhi.
To strengthen the Architecture Program, the HKE Societyâs governing Council in its meeting dated 29-05-2019, resolved to convert the Department of Architecture as a Standalone School of Architecture. On 21st. September 2021 the HKE Societyâs proposal to name the School of Architecture as âPoojya Dr. Shivakumar Swamiji School of Architectureâ was approved by the Council of Architecture.
School has a team of well experienced and highly qualified Post Graduate faculty members from prestigious universities & Institutions like, Bangalore University, SPA Delhi, IIT Roorkee, RVCA Bengaluru, MSRIT, JNAFAU- Hyderabad, DOMUS â Italy and many other institutes to say.
About the Logo
The logo symbolizes harmony, creativity, and the integration of tradition with modernity â values upheld by the school and the architectural discipline.
Facilities
State-of-the-art Studios
Digital Labs and Library
Workshops and Material Museum
Wi-Fi enabled campus
We Value Your Feedback
Please share your thoughts, suggestions, or concerns with us. Your input helps us improve.
Name*
Email ID*
Phone Number*
Feedback / Suggestion*
Submit
Reset
Principalâs Message
Prof. Sanjyot Shah
Principal, PDSS School of Architecture
Welcome to the Poojya Dr. Shivakumar Swamiji School of Architecture. As we continue to build upon a legacy of excellence in architectural education, it is our utmost priority to nurture creativity, critical thinking, and innovation in every student who walks through our doors.
At our school, we believe that architecture is not just about creating buildings but about shaping environments that inspire and enhance the lives of the people who inhabit them. we are committed to fostering an environment where academic excellence, personal growth, and community engagement go hand in hand. Our faculty and staff are dedicated to guiding and supporting students as they embark on their academic journeys and pursue their passions
We are committed to fostering a learning environment where students are encouraged to push the boundaries of design and think critically about the impact of their work on society. Our approach combines a strong foundation in ...

At our school, we believe that architecture is not just about creating buildings but about shaping environments that inspire and enhance the lives of the people who inhabit them. we are committed to fostering an environment where academic excellence, personal growth, and community engagement go hand in hand. Our faculty and staff are dedicated to guiding and supporting students as they embark on their academic journeys and pursue their passions

About the College
The HKE Society envisioned starting a program in architecture with aim to cater to the needs of Building and Construction Industry in Northern region of Karnataka. The Department of Architecture was established under the aegis of PDA College of Engineering in the year 1983-84 with an intake of 40 approved by the Council of Architecture and affiliated to the Gulbarga University,
The Department of Architecture has celebrated its âSILVER JUBIILEEâ in 2009 and has achieved many feats and awards.
Its alumni have spread all over the globe serving the Building Industry at various positions.
In 2015 the intake was enhanced from 40 to 80 by the Council of architecture, New Delhi.
To strengthen the Architecture Program, the HKE Societyâs governing Council in its meeting dated 29-05-2019, resolved to convert the Department of Architecture as a Standalone School of Architecture. On 21st. September 2021 the HKE Societyâs proposal to name the School of Architecture as âPoojya Dr. Shivakumar Swamiji School of Architectureâ was approved by the Council of Architecture.
School has a team of well experienced and highly qualified Post Graduate faculty members from prestigious universities & Institutions like, Bangalore University, SPA Delhi, IIT Roorkee, RVCA Bengaluru, MSRIT, JNAFAU- Hyderabad, DOMUS â Italy and many other institutes to say.
About the Logo
The logo symbolizes harmony, creativity, and the integration of tradition with modernity â values upheld by the school and the architectural discipline.
Facilities
State-of-the-art Studios
Digital Labs and Library
Workshops and Material Museum
Wi-Fi enabled campus
